entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local amount 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:09 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
